Method Detail

list

public Orkut.Activities.List list(String userId,
                                  String collection)
                           throws IOException
Retrieves a list of activities. Create a request for the method "activities.list". This request holds the parameters needed by the the orkut server. After setting any optional parameters, call the Orkut.Activities.List.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.

Parameters:
userId - The ID of the user whose activities will be listed. Can be me to refer to the viewer (i.e. the authenticated user).
collection - The collection of activities to list.
Returns:
the request
Throws:
IOException - if the initialization of the request fails

delete

public Orkut.Activities.Delete delete(String activityId)
                               throws IOException
Deletes an existing activity, if the access controls allow it. Create a request for the method "activities.delete". This request holds the parameters needed by the the orkut server. After setting any optional parameters, call the Orkut.Activities.Delete.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.

Parameters:
activityId - ID of the activity to remove.
Returns:
the request
Throws:
IOException - if the initialization of the request fails
